extensionAttribute.description: This attribute will report the version of the McAfee EPO Agent installed on the client computer.
extensionAttribute.scriptContentsMac: #!/bin/sh #Reports the version of the McAfee epO Agent installed on the client computer. #Data Type in JSS for this script should be set to: string Version=`cat /etc/cma.d/EPOAGENT3700MACX/config.xml | egrep ".*" |sed -e "s/\(.*\)<\/Version>/\1/"|tr "|" " "` echo ''$Version''
